moduleMetadataJson.name: Windows Gather SMB Share Enumeration via Registry
moduleMetadataJson.description: This module will enumerate configured and recently used file shares
author: Carlos Perez <carlos_perez@darkoperator.com>

options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module

options.name: SESSION
options.description: The session to run this module on.

options.name: ENTERED
options.description: Enumerate Recently entered UNC Paths in the Run Dialog
